title: Tenganan Pegringsingan Village Experience (Half-day)
overview: Explore Tenganan Pegringsingan, one of Bali's oldest villages, famous for its unique traditions and double ikat weaving.

stops.description: Arrive and tour the village, interact with locals, and observe double ikat weaving.

title: Tenganan Village & East Bali Tour (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring Tenganan Pegringsingan and the highlights of East Bali.

stops.description: Arrive and explore the village and observe traditional crafts.
Visit nearby attractions such as Tirta Gangga or Ujung Water Palace.
